HOW TO 

Instalando o GULP global (caso n�o tenha instalado ainda)
npm install -g gulp


Instalando o gulp no repositorio atual e identificando as dependendias de dev
npm install gulp --save-dev


instalar os plugins necess�rios
npm install gulp-concat gulp-uglify gulp-jshint gulp-ngdoc --save-dev

Executar a tarefa:
gulp ms-ckeditor
